get.description: Get a Deployment. '.default' and '.unassigned' are system defined values and cannot be used for product or device group name.

parameters.name: deploymentName
parameters.description: Deployment name. Use .default for deployment creation and to get the current deployment for the associated device group.

put.description: Create a Deployment. '.default' and '.unassigned' are system defined values and cannot be used for product or device group name.

parameters.name: deploymentName
parameters.description: Deployment name. Use .default for deployment creation and to get the current deployment for the associated device group.

get.description: List Device resources by DeviceGroup. '.default' and '.unassigned' are system defined values and cannot be used for product or device group name.
Get a Device. Use '.unassigned' or '.default' for the device group and product names when a device does not belong to a device group and product.

put.description: Create a Device. Use '.unassigned' or '.default' for the device group and product names to claim a device to the catalog only.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: A link to the status monitor

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

patch.description: Update a Device. Use '.unassigned' or '.default' for the device group and product names to move a device to the catalog level.

parameters.description: The resource properties to be updated.

post.description: Generates the capability image for the device. Use '.unassigned' or '.default' for the device group and product names to generate the image for a device that does not belong to a specific device group and product.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

post.description: Generates default device groups for the product. '.default' and '.unassigned' are system defined values and cannot be used for product name.
